item.title: Basic terms in the probability theory
item.description: Basic terms in probability theory are outcomes, sample space, events, and probability measure.

item.title: Borel Ïƒ-algebra
item.description: When one studies probability theory, a notion of a Borel \(\sigma\)-algebra arises. Here we will look at what this is.
